name: Condolence Puppet
desc: Send "Gimmick Puppet" monsters from your Deck to the GY equal to the the number of monsters your opponent controls that were Special Summoned from the Extra Deck, +1. You can banish this card from the GY, then target 1 Machine Xyz Monster you control; that monster cannot be destroyed by your opponent's effects while face-up on the field. You can only use each effect of "Condolence Puppet" once per turn.
